original_text: So the officers went back to Moab. They told King Balak that Balaam would not come with them.
korean_text: 모압 귀족들이 일어나 발락에게로 가서 전하되 발람이 우리와 함께 오기를 거절하더이다

sentences.original_text: So the officers went back to Moab
that Balaam would not come with them
sentences.korean_translation: 발람이 그들과 함께 오지 않을 것이라고
